tool.name: OptimizePointsLocation

param.name: in_surface
param.dialogReference: Surface on which the points are located and according to which the points are optimized.

param.name: in_distance
param.dialogReference: Distance in which the higher points are located.

param.name: in_use_mask
param.dialogReference: Use of mask can enhance the selection of points.

param.name: in_mask
param.dialogReference: Raster layer of the mask. Values higher then 0 marks locations that can be used.

tool.summary: A tool for finding highest point in the neighboorhood of existing point. These locations have chance to enhance visibility. The change can be possitive (better visibility) but there is chance that the visibility can be influenced negatively. The selection of the higher points can be further better specify by the use of mask, that marks locations that should not be used e.g. the points should be located on the ground and not on the vegetation or buildings.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: A tool for finding highest point in the neighboorhood of existing point. These locations have chance to enhance visibility. The change can be possitive (better visibility) but there is chance that the visibility can be influenced negatively. The selection of the higher points can be further better specify by the use of mask, that marks locations that should not be used e.g. the points should be located on the ground and not on the vegetation or buildings.
